cause.description: SLDN is a national, non-profit legal services, watchdog and policy organization dedicated to ending discrimination against and harassment of military personnel affected by "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" and related forms of intolerance. Help SLDN fight this important civil rights battle by making a secure online donation today at www.sldn.org/donate! http://www.sldn.org/ Servicemembers Legal Defense Network PO Box 65301 Washington DC 20035-5301 1. Lift the ban preventing gays, lesbians and bisexuals from serving openly and honestly in the military. 2. Provide free legal services to service members harmed by "Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell" and related, discriminatory policies. 3. Protect service members from harassment based on perceived sexual orientation or gender identity. 4. Advocate for policies and practices that improve the lives of service members.
